OUTLINE : This multicenter study . Patients sequentially assign 1 3 treatment group . - Group I : Patients receive boronophenylalanine-fructose complex ( BPA-F ) IV 1 hour . Two hour later , patient undergo surgical resection . - Group II : Patients receive sodium borocaptate ( BSH ) IV 1 hour . Twelve hour later , patient undergo surgical resection . - Group III : Patients receive BSH IV 1 hour ( administer 12 hour prior surgery ) BPA-F IV 1 hour ( administer 2 hour prior surgery ) . Patients undergo surgical resection . During plan surgery , tissue sample tumor surround tissue collect . Patients follow day 1 5 4 week . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : A maximum 27 patient accrue study .
